extends java.lang.Object
    class for performing various actions in data conversion

    deves

      • setFlags

        public void setFlags(FrameC f)
        Sets values to flags after checking ADC status flags 0 to 15 corresponding to ADC 1 to 16
        Parameters:
        f - the frame containing components to be checked
